medical_history.history_of_present_illness: RUQ/epigastric pain started at 7 PM, 7 hours prior to presentation. Patient experienced 3 episodes of vomiting (containing undigested food, water, and PeptoBismol). Similar episode occurred 2 days ago after consuming fried chicken, which resolved after 3 hours. No fevers, chills, or diarrhea noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Thoracic epidural abscess with surgery and bilateral lower extremity weakness; PCOS; headaches.
medical_history.family_history: Maternal grandmother had lung cancer and underwent cholecystectomy for cholelithiasis. Mother had 'blood clots in the legs.' Father died possibly due to cirrhosis and drug use. Brother is healthy.
